ai-tha-ap285:0.3_0: held upright and with senior monks.
ai-tha-ap285:1.4_0: but not when there are coming.
ai-tha-ap285:2.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap285:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap285:4.1_0: At seven eons of the eon
ai-tha-ap285:4.3_0: don’t look down on the following day,
ai-tha-ap285:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap285:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Ugga.
ai-tha-ap285:7.1_0: The senior monks would go out to meet senior monks.
